question: Bring out the only incorrect statement:
option1: The constitutional amendment bill can only be ratified by the president but not returned
option2: Under powers given by Article 111, President can withhold his / her assent to a bill
option3: A High Court Judge addresses his / her resignation to Chief Justice of India
option4: Abolition of Untouchability is included in the Right to Equality
answer: A High Court Judge addresses his / her resignation to Chief Justice of India
explanation: Please note that High Court Judge addresses the resignation to President of India
